name: Initiative Tracker Plus
description: **From Ken L's original Tracker Jacker script.**An attempt to modernize Tracker Jacker and add new functionality as it becomes desired.For help visit [Initiative Tracker Plus Readme](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-api-scripts/blob/master/InitiativeTrackerPlus/README.md) or the [Roll20 Forums Thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/9805171/script-initiative-tracker-plus-successor-to-tracker-jacker).
